result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
